definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi, one of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
west
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
surname Yue

sentences.english: Five Mountains in China, and once called the West Mountain in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 它是中國五嶽之一，在古代被稱爲西嶽。

sentences.english: Focused on the music sheet in front of him, Zhuo Xiyue enthusiastically instructs his class.
sentences.chinese: 專心看著眼前的歌譜，教導國樂的卓西嶽活力十足。

sentences.english: Nanyue mountain is one of the five most famous mountains in China .
sentences.chinese: 它是中國五嶽之一，在古代被稱爲西嶽。

definition: the Baima or White Horse Temple in Luoyang, one of the earliest Buddhist temples in China
